programme.desc: According to prosecutors in their opening statements, money was the motive for this murder. Next, Melody Farris' defense delivered their opening remarks to the jury. programme.title: CA v. O.J. Simpson

programme.title: CA v. O.J. Simpson

programme.title: CA v. O.J. Simpson

programme.title: CA v. O.J. Simpson

programme.desc: Jurors heard from two DNA experts about their test results on blood linked to the murders of Nicole Brown Simpson and Ronald Goldman.

programme.title: CA v. O.J. Simpson
programme.desc: DNA helps determine the probability that it came from someone in particular. You can also exclude others as the source. The State wanted jurors to understand what the DNA showed about the likelihood that O.J. Simpson was at the crime scene.

programme.title: Davis Riley Wins Charles Schwab Challenge
programme.desc: Davis Riley wins the 2024 Charles Schwab Challenge to get his first solo win on the PGA TOUR. Riley's last win was at the 2023 Zurich Classic with teammate Nick Hardy. Riley shot rounds of 66-64-66-70 to finish 14-under par.

programme.title: Russell Henley Wins Arnold Palmer Invitational
programme.desc: Russell Henley captures his fifth PGA TOUR victory after winning the 2025 Arnold Palmer Invitational presented by Mastercard. Henley shot rounds of 72-68-67-70 to finish 11-under par.

programme.title: Hideki Matsuyama Wins The Genesis Invitational 2024
programme.desc: Hideki Matsuyama captures his ninth victory on the PGA TOUR, winning The Genesis Invitational 2024 after starting the day with six shots off the lead. Matsuyama shot rounds of 69-68-68-62 to finish 17-under par.

programme.title: Race Tapes
